info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 6 at 11:23AM CDT until May 10 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans LA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in New Orleans LA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Louisiana...
Tangipahoa River Near Robert affecting Tangipahoa Parish.
For the Tangipahoa River...including Robert...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Tangipahoa River near Robert.
* WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to early Saturday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor flooding near the river with beach areas under water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday afternoon to a crest of 16.0 feet Friday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/lix. Click on the Rivers and Lakes menu for forecasts and observations.
The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON
